card1.title: Tribu
card1.description: Tribu is a social network that connects people with common interests, allowing them to share content and build communities easily and quickly.

card2.title: Lumino
card2.description: Lumino simplifies the management of educational centers, organizing activities, events, and resources for students, teachers, and administrators.

card3.title: TrackTask
card3.description: TrackTask is an app for managing daily tasks, helping to organize, prioritize, and track what you need to do.

responsabilidades: Developed predictive models using Python and libraries such as scikit-learn and TensorFlow.
Conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends and patterns in large datasets.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to implement data-driven solutions that improved strategic decision-making.
Optimized data cleaning and transformation processes, reducing data preparation time by 30%.
Developed web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborated in an agile team to improve project efficiency.
Implemented innovative solutions that increased customer satisfaction.

aboutMe.description: I am Nichole Louis, 24 years old, and I hold a Higher Degree in Web Development. I am currently pursuing a master's degree in Data Science, where I am expanding my knowledge in data analysis, machine learning, and advanced technologies to solve complex problems. My education and passion for technology allow me to approach projects with creativity and a focus on innovative solutions.
